```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = FALSE)
library(kableExtra)
```

## Meeting Schedule and Overview

```{r, warning=FALSE}
Week <- c(1:5)
Date <- c("01/23","01/30","02/06","02/13","02/20")
Topic <- c("Intro","Using Genomes to Understand the Tree of Life","Week 2 Discussion","Integrating 'Omics, Aquaculture, and Parasitology to Investigate Eastern Oyster Immunity to Disease","Week 4 Discussion")
Speaker <- c("Instructors","Bob Literman","Instructors","Erin Roberts","Instructors")
Assignment <- c("","","","Week 2 Write-Up","")

meetings <- cbind(Week,Date,Topic, Speaker, Assignment)

kable(meetings, "html") %>%  
  kable_styling(bootstrap_options = c("striped", "hover", "responsive"))
```
